No fix for that until our bespoke Orion IVA is ready.

Ok, that is nice.

A little small, but nice...

Argh, how big is that thing?

Looks great. 

Cheers.
they fit in a 6.3m diameter fairing, it ain't that small... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
A bit tragic about the noticeably visible docking port issue. Still impressive.

> 
> A bit tragic about the noticeably visible docking port issue. Still impressive.

Thats because of Kerbin's gravity, on Duna or smaller, the wheeled hab sits higher and it locks in.

**Success!**

Yanfret, when testing your rovers and bases, do you pick the same site on the Mun?
Oh no half the fun of dock port testing is finding exciting new craters

Need some pictures in the snow ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) hehe maybe on duna poles or some EVE beach front

EDIT- Not sure if EVE would be beach front or swamp front ?

Does this count?

![QCnTCL.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img540/2974/QCnTCL.jpg)
Guess so think, I do see alittle snow top back there lol.

> 
> PLEASE add this mod to CKAN.... CKAN makes it soooo easy to keep mods updated. Saludos desde panama parse

I agree! Pretty please, with sugar on top ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Has this pack been completely updated for 1.0.4??? Sorry if its buried somewhere in the comments.. I started on page 20 and worked this way and didn't see anything on it
Very soon
You're the best. Long time user of Chaka and many more!
**YANFRET**, please clean your inbox.

**Update: 1.0.4**

See page 1 for details

![Tki0R1.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img540/5301/Tki0R1.jpg)

Woohoo update ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) time for a Duna run and hope for a snow landing hehe and check out them Rockets.

EDIT- Whoops got to see the snow but thought, I was decoupling empty tank and engine and whoops heat shield went with it so came in alittle to fast ![screenshot0.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/CMES/screenshot0.png)

Hope there's alot of Rockets in stock ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ( Hey YANFRET I need to order more Rockets I made a part pack out of that one ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) )

thanks for the update !
Thanks for the update!! Great stuff...

Got a mission on the way to Dres! This update is awesome!

having a blast building and flying the Monkey Transfer Vechilce (sic)! but had a question about the production information card. 

The cards for A, B, and C all say "*see detailed MTV product information card for detailed MTV operational instructions*" 

Is that card in a different location? or has it just not been made yet? or is the card just telling me to look at itself ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
If I just answer *Yes* will you accept that? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
